name: Idle Hex Realms
description:
THIS IS A BROWSER COMPATIBLE STRIPPED-DOWN  EDITION!

Join this group then you can download the full game from Google Play

Current version here: 0.1.1

Join the official discord server

Visit the official website: https://www.idlehexrealms.com/

If it's not saving then you have to enable 3rd party cookies with the shield icon (Firefox) or the packlock icon (Chrome) next to the URL bar.

If your browser has problem supporting WebGL, you can find help here: https://get.webgl.org/
